text: wlwla 'ana allah taealaa qad mann ealayk -ayha alrswl- wrhmk biniemat alnbwt, fesmk btwfyqh bima awha 'ilyk, lezmt jamaeat min aladhin ykhwnwn 'anfusuhum 'an yuzilluk ean tariq alhq, wama yuzillun bdhlk 'iilaa anfshm, wama yaqdirun ealaa 'iydhayk lesmt allah lk, wa'anzal allah ealayk alquran walsanat almbynt lh, whdak 'iilaa eilm ma lm takun telmh min qbl, wakan ma khssak allah bih min fdl amrana ezymana
